text: Marquis Dendy (born November 17, 1992) is an American track and field athlete, primarily known for horizontal jumping events.http://www.legacy.usatf.org/Athlete-Bios/Marquis-Dendy.aspx He is the 2015 National Champion in the Long Jump. His winning jump, of , though wind aided at +3.7mps, his first jump of the competition, was the longest jump in the world under any conditions in over 5 years.http://www.flashresults.com/2015_Meets/Outdoor/06-25_USATF/028-1_compiled.htmhttp://www.alltime- athletics.com/mlongok.htmhttp://www.alltime-athletics.com/mlongno.htm He grew up in Middletown, Delaware.Meet Marquis Dendy. Spikes. Retrieved 2017-12-18. Place |- |Rowspan=2|2018 || 2018 NACAC Championships || Toronto, Canada || Long Jump || || bgcolor="gold" |1st |- || World Indoor Championships || Birmingham, United Kingdom || Long Jump || || bgcolor="cc9966" |3rd |- |2017 || 16th IAAF World Championships Outdoor || London, United Kingdom || Long jump || || 20th (q) |- | 2016 || World Indoor Championships || Portland, Oregon || Long jump || || bgcolor="gold" |1st |- | Rowspan=2|2015 || Rowspan=2|15th IAAF World Championships Outdoor || Rowspan=2|Beijing National Stadium || Triple jump || || 13th |- |Long jump || || 21st |- | 2013 || 14th IAAF World Championships Outdoor || Luzhniki Stadium, Moscow, Russia || Long jump || || 27th |- | 2012 || 7th NACAC Under-23 Championships Outdoor || Irapuato, Mexico || Long jump || || bgcolor="gold" |1st |- | 2010 || 13th IAAF World Junior Championships Outdoor || Moncton, New Brunswick, Canada || Triple jump || || 8th |} ==NCAA== Dendy just had completed his final season at the University of Florida, where he won the 2015 NCAA Division I Outdoor Track and Field Championships in both the long jump and the triple jump, defending his 2014 championships in the same events. He accomplished the same double at the 2015 NCAA Division I Indoor Track and Field Championships, setting the meet record in the Triple Jump. His first NCAA Championship was the 2013 Indoor Championship in the long jump. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !! Championship !! Venue !! Event !! Time !! Indoor Track Stadium - College Station, TX || Triple jump || || 11th |- | Long jump || || 4th |- | NCAA Indoor || Albuquerque Convention Center - Albuquerque, NM || Long jump || || 16th |- | Rowspan=2|Southeastern Conference Outdoor ||Rowspan=2| Kentucky - Lexington, KY || Triple jump || || 1st |- | Long jump || || 10th |- | Rowspan=2|NCAA Outdoor || Rowspan=2|Hayward Field - Eugene, OR || Triple jump || || 1st |- | Long jump || || 1st |- | Rowspan=8|2015 || Rowspan=2|Southeastern Conference Indoor || Rowspan=2|Kentucky - Nutter Field House - Lexington, KY || Triple jump || || 1st |- | Long jump || || 1st |- | Rowspan=2|NCAA Indoor || Rowspan=2|Arkansas- Randall Tyson Track - Fayetteville, AR || Triple jump || || 1st |- | Long jump || || 1st |- | Rowspan=2|Southeastern Conference Outdoor ||Rowspan=2| Mississippi St. - Mississippi State, MS || Triple jump || || 1st |- | Long jump || || 1st |- | Rowspan=2|NCAA Outdoor || Rowspan=2|Hayward Field - Eugene, OR || Triple jump || || 1st |- | Long jump || || 1st |} ==High school== Marquis Dendy competed for Middletown High School in Middletown, Delawarehttp://www.athletic.net/TrackAndField/Athlete.aspx?AID=591249 where he set the state records in both jumping events.http://www.delawareonline.com/story/sports/college/2015/06/13/middletowns- marquis-dendy-wins-th-ncaa-track-crown-florida/71193618/ After high school he competed for the US in the 2012 NACAC Under-23 Championships in Athletics, winning the gold medal in the long jump. He had previously experienced international competition as a 17-year-old in the 2010 World Junior Championships in Athletics where he finished 8th in the triple jump.http://www.iaaf.org/competitions/iaaf-world-junior-championships/13th- iaaf-world-junior-championships-4146/results/men/triple-jump/final ==Personal== He grew up in a sporting family: his father was a sprinter at high school while his mother Dionne was a collegiate sprinter. His aunt Terri Dendy was a sprint relay medalist at the 1993 World Championships in Athletics.Marquis Cha Cha. SPIKES Magazine (2015-07-09). Retrieved on 2015-07-16. He shared the Delaware Sportswriters and Broadcasters Association's award as Delaware's Outstanding Athlete of 2014. http://www.delasports.org/Athlete-of-the-Year.html ==References== ==External links== *Marquis Dendy twitter profile *Marquis Dendy instagram profile * *Marquis Dendy University of Florida profile *Marquis Dendy Diamond League profile *Marquis Dendy Athletics profile Category:Living people Category:1992 births Category:Track and field athletes from Delaware Category:American male long jumpers Category:American male triple jumpers Category:African-American male track and field athletes Category:Florida Gators men's track and field athletes Category:World Athletics Championships athletes for the United States Category:USA Outdoor Track and Field Championships winners Category:USA Indoor Track and Field Championships winners Category:World Athletics Indoor Championships winners
title: Marquis Dendy
